title: Bentota Beach Escape

itinerary.title: Beach Relaxation
itinerary.description: Spend your day on pristine golden beaches. Try water sports or simply unwind by the Indian Ocean.

itinerary.title: River Safari
itinerary.description: Morning boat ride on the Bentota River. Spot crocodiles, monitor lizards, and diverse birdlife in their natural habitat.

description: Relax on golden beaches and explore the scenic Bentota River. Designed for travellers who want a slower pace and time by the sea. Perfect for couples and families seeking coastal tranquility.
